short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Genius.com directly in the context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Be able to search lyrics, artists, albums with a simple right click. Simply highlight the text. It is the easiest way to get music information fast!


To use highlight a word or phrase you would like to search for and right click to open the context menu. Select the "Search on Genius'" option from the menu. A new tab will open with the search results.
